attributes.action: introduce legislation so that any ex member of parliament who earns, externally, more than the value of his taxpayer funded pension has that pension abated pound for pound by the excess.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anybody on benefits who earns more than the limit has their benefits abated pound for pound by the amount over their benefits, which they earn.  Why should politicians, like Tony Bliar, go on to increase his earnings, vastly, because he has no costs, the GP taxpayer pays ALL his living costs.  This has to be stopped.
